Hi,

  Ok, this is a braindead question - I just modified the Simple profile just so:

   Made BroadScope (just because).
   Max Path Depth: 2


and I ended up with all 100 URLs in the report with this status:


  http://aolmail.aol.com/  Heritrix(-5000)-Out of scope  Seed was disregarded


I basically want to eventually do a download of a full set of pages 
from a list (not actually crawl anything but FRAME content). I 
figured if I put path depth 2 this would be ok initially.

Any comments/help?

  Cheers,
   Winton
